players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out today."
You: "Diana, that's a very quick accusation. How do we know you're actually the detective and not the mafioso trying to eliminate Bob?"
Bob: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why would you reveal yourself so early? That seems like a mafia play to get the town to mislynch."
Bob: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate me? That makes no sense unless you're mafia trying to frame me."
Diana: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob and he is mafia. Alice, if you're town, you should trust me and vote Bob out."
You: "Diana, your claim seems suspicious. If you were really the detective, revealing yourself this early puts you at huge risk. Bob raises good points about your strategy."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
